rules.description: 查询特定供应商的库存物料详情，支持聚龙、BOE、华星等供应商
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        batch_code as 批次号,
        quantity as 库存数量,
        storage_location as 存储位置,
        status as 状态,
        risk_level as 风险等级,
        inbound_time as 入库时间
      FROM inventory 
      WHERE supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      ORDER BY inbound_time DESC
      LIMIT 20
rules.example_query: 查询聚龙供应商的库存情况

rules.description: 查询特定状态的批次信息，支持正常、风险、冻结状态
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        batch_code as 批次号,
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        status as 状态,
        risk_level as 风险等级,
        quantity as 数量,
        storage_location as 位置
      FROM inventory 
      WHERE status = ?
      ORDER BY inbound_time DESC
      LIMIT 15
rules.example_query: 查询风险状态的批次

rules.description: 查询物料的测试结果和质量状况，支持按供应商筛选
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        batch_code as 批次号,
        test_result as 测试结果,
        test_item as 测试项目,
        test_date as 测试日期,
        conclusion as 结论,
        defect_desc as 缺陷描述
      FROM lab_tests
      WHERE supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      ORDER BY test_date DESC
      LIMIT 20
rules.example_query: 查询华星供应商的测试结果

rules.description: 查询特定物料类型的库存分布，支持电池盖、中框、显示屏等
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        COUNT(*) as 批次数量,
        SUM(quantity) as 总库存,
        storage_location as 存储位置,
        status as 状态
      FROM inventory 
      WHERE material_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY material_name, supplier_name, storage_location, status
      ORDER BY 总库存 DESC
rules.example_query: 查询电池盖的库存分布情况

rules.description: 统计各工厂的库存情况，支持重庆、深圳、南昌、宜宾工厂
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        storage_location as 工厂,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_name) as 物料种类,
        COUNT(*) as 批次数量,
        SUM(quantity) as 总库存,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN status = '风险' THEN 1 END) as 风险批次,
        ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN status = '风险' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as 风险比例
      FROM inventory 
      WHERE storage_location LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY storage_location
      ORDER BY 总库存 DESC
rules.example_query: 统计深圳工厂的库存情况

rules.description: 查询库存数量低于阈值的物料预警信息
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        SUM(quantity) as 总库存,
        COUNT(*) as 批次数量,
        storage_location as 主要存储位置
      FROM inventory 
      GROUP BY material_name, supplier_name, storage_location
      HAVING SUM(quantity) < 1000
      ORDER BY 总库存 ASC
rules.example_query: 查询库存不足的物料预警

rules.description: 分析供应商或物料的测试通过率统计
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        material_name as 物料名称,
        COUNT(*) as 总测试次数,
        SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 通过次数,
        ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as 通过率,
        COUNT(DISTINCT batch_code) as 批次数量
      FROM lab_tests
      WHERE supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY supplier_name, material_name
      ORDER BY 通过率 DESC
rules.example_query: 分析聚龙供应商的测试通过率

rules.intent_name: 状态查询,风险查询,冻结查询,正常查询
rules.description: 查询特定状态的库存物料
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        status as 状态,
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        storage_location as 工厂,
        batch_code as 批次号,
        quantity as 数量,
        risk_level as 风险等级,
        DATE_FORMAT(inbound_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as 入库日期
      FROM inventory
      WHERE status IN ('正常','风险','冻结')
        AND (status LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%') OR ? = '')
      ORDER BY
        CASE status
          WHEN '冻结' THEN 1
          WHEN '风险' THEN 2
          WHEN '正常' THEN 3
        END,
        created_at DESC
      LIMIT 20
rules.example_query: 查询风险状态的库存

rules.description: 根据批次号追溯完整的物料流转信息
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        '库存' as 数据源,
        batch_code as 批次号,
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        inbound_time as 时间,
        status as 状态
      FROM inventory 
      WHERE batch_code = ?
      UNION ALL
      SELECT 
        '测试' as 数据源,
        batch_code as 批次号,
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        test_date as 时间,
        test_result as 状态
      FROM lab_tests 
      WHERE batch_code = ?
      ORDER BY 时间 DESC
rules.example_query: 追溯批次113621的完整信息

rules.description: 统计各测试项目的执行情况和结果分布
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        test_item as 测试项目,
        COUNT(*) as 测试次数,
        SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 通过次数,
        SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'FAIL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 失败次数,
        ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as 通过率
      FROM lab_tests
      GROUP BY test_item
      ORDER BY 测试次数 DESC
rules.example_query: 统计各测试项目的执行情况

rules.description: 查询物料的生产跟踪信息和使用情况
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        batch_code as 批次号,
        factory as 工厂,
        workshop as 车间,
        line as 产线,
        defect_rate as 不良率,
        exception_count as 异常次数,
        use_time as 使用时间
      FROM online_tracking
      WHERE supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      ORDER BY use_time DESC
      LIMIT 20
rules.example_query: 查询BOE供应商的生产跟踪情况

rules.description: 分析各工厂的生产效率和缺陷率表现
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        factory as 工厂,
        COUNT(*) as 生产记录数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_name) as 物料种类,
        AVG(defect_rate) as 平均不良率,
        SUM(exception_count) as 总异常次数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_name) as 供应商数量
      FROM online_tracking
      WHERE factory LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY factory
      ORDER BY 平均不良率 ASC
rules.example_query: 分析深圳工厂的生产效率

rules.description: 统计各供应商提供的物料种类和数量分布
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_name) as 物料种类数,
        COUNT(*) as 总批次数,
        SUM(quantity) as 总库存量,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT material_name SEPARATOR ', ') as 物料清单
      FROM inventory 
      WHERE supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY supplier_name
      ORDER BY 物料种类数 DESC
rules.example_query: 统计聚龙供应商的物料种类分布

rules.description: 查询和分析测试中发现的缺陷类型和分布
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        defect_desc as 缺陷描述,
        COUNT(*) as 出现次数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_name) as 涉及供应商数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_name) as 涉及物料数,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT supplier_name SEPARATOR ', ') as 供应商列表
      FROM lab_tests
      WHERE test_result = 'FAIL' AND defect_desc IS NOT NULL AND defect_desc != ''
      GROUP BY defect_desc
      ORDER BY 出现次数 DESC
      LIMIT 10
rules.example_query: 分析测试中发现的主要缺陷类型

rules.description: 查询特定工厂的物料分布和存储情况
rules.action_target:
SELECT 
        material_name as 物料名称,
        COUNT(*) as 批次数量,
        SUM(quantity) as 总数量,
        COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_name) as 供应商数量,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT supplier_name SEPARATOR ', ') as 供应商列表
      FROM inventory 
      WHERE storage_location LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY material_name
      ORDER BY 总数量 DESC
rules.example_query: 查询深圳工厂的物料分布情况

rules.description: 查询特定批次的完整测试历史记录
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        test_date as 测试日期,
        test_item as 测试项目,
        test_result as 测试结果,
        conclusion as 结论,
        defect_desc as 缺陷描述,
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商
      FROM lab_tests
      WHERE batch_code = ?
      ORDER BY test_date DESC
rules.example_query: 查询批次113621的测试历史

rules.description: 统计和排名各产线的不良率表现
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        factory as 工厂,
        workshop as 车间,
        line as 产线,
        COUNT(*) as 生产次数,
        AVG(defect_rate) as 平均不良率,
        MAX(defect_rate) as 最高不良率,
        SUM(exception_count) as 异常总数
      FROM online_tracking
      GROUP BY factory, workshop, line
      HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3
      ORDER BY 平均不良率 DESC
      LIMIT 15
rules.example_query: 查看产线不良率排名情况

rules.description: 分析各物料的测试覆盖情况和测试完整性
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        i.material_name as 物料名称,
        i.supplier_name as 供应商,
        COUNT(DISTINCT i.batch_code) as 库存批次数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT t.batch_code) as 已测试批次数,
        ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT t.batch_code) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT i.batch_code), 2) as 测试覆盖率
      FROM inventory i
      LEFT JOIN lab_tests t ON i.batch_code = t.batch_code
      WHERE i.material_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY i.material_name, i.supplier_name
      ORDER BY 测试覆盖率 ASC
rules.example_query: 分析电池盖的测试覆盖率

rules.description: 分析特定物料在生产过程中的表现
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        COUNT(*) as 使用次数,
        AVG(defect_rate) as 平均不良率,
        COUNT(DISTINCT factory) as 使用工厂数,
        SUM(exception_count) as 总异常次数
      FROM online_tracking
      WHERE material_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      GROUP BY material_name, supplier_name
      ORDER BY 平均不良率 ASC
rules.example_query: 分析电池盖的生产表现

rules.description: 分析测试结果的时间趋势和质量变化
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        DATE(test_date) as 测试日期,
        COUNT(*) as 测试总数,
        SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 通过数量,
        ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as 当日通过率
      FROM lab_tests
      WHERE supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
      AND test_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
      GROUP BY DATE(test_date)
      ORDER BY 测试日期 DESC
rules.example_query: 分析聚龙供应商的测试结果趋势

rules.description: 统计生产过程中的异常事件和频率
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        factory as 工厂,
        workshop as 车间,
        COUNT(*) as 生产记录数,
        SUM(exception_count) as 异常总数,
        ROUND(SUM(exception_count) * 1.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as 平均异常频率,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN exception_count > 0 THEN 1 END) as 有异常记录数
      FROM online_tracking
      GROUP BY factory, workshop
      ORDER BY 异常总数 DESC
rules.example_query: 统计生产异常事件情况

rules.description: 统计和分析测试结果的分布情况
rules.action_target: SELECT test_result, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lab_tests), 2) as percentage FROM lab_tests GROUP BY test_result

rules.description: 对比不同供应商的质量表现和测试结果
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        COUNT(*) as 总测试次数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_name) as 物料种类,
        SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 通过次数,
        ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN test_result = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as 通过率,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN test_result = 'FAIL' THEN 1 END) as 失败次数
      FROM lab_tests
      GROUP BY supplier_name
      HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5
      ORDER BY 通过率 DESC
rules.example_query: 对比各供应商的质量表现

rules.description: 追踪特定批次在生产线上的使用记录
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        use_time as 使用时间,
        factory as 工厂,
        workshop as 车间,
        line as 产线,
        defect_rate as 不良率,
        exception_count as 异常次数,
        material_name as 物料名称,
        supplier_name as 供应商
      FROM online_tracking
      WHERE batch_code = ?
      ORDER BY use_time DESC
rules.example_query: 追踪批次113621的生产使用情况

rules.description: 对比不同供应商物料在生产中的质量表现
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        supplier_name as 供应商,
        COUNT(*) as 生产使用次数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_name) as 物料种类,
        AVG(defect_rate) as 平均不良率,
        SUM(exception_count) as 总异常次数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT factory) as 使用工厂数
      FROM online_tracking
      GROUP BY supplier_name
      HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5
      ORDER BY 平均不良率 ASC
rules.example_query: 对比各供应商的生产质量表现

rules.description: 分析生产时间分布和使用频率
rules.action_target:
SELECT
        DATE(use_time) as 使用日期,
        COUNT(*) as 生产次数,
        COUNT(DISTINCT material_name) as 物料种类,
        AVG(defect_rate) as 平均不良率,
        SUM(exception_count) as 异常总数
      FROM online_tracking
      WHERE use_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
      GROUP BY DATE(use_time)
      ORDER BY 使用日期 DESC
      LIMIT 15
rules.example_query: 分析最近的生产时间分布

rules.description: 统计真实测试结果分布，支持PASS/FAIL状态查询
rules.action_target: SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result LIKE CONCAT("%", ?, "%") ORDER BY test_date DESC
rules.example_query: 统计OK和PENDING和NG的测试结果

rules.description: 查询特定工厂的库存详情，支持工厂名称参数提取
rules.action_target: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE storage_location LIKE CONCAT("%", ?, "%") ORDER BY inbound_time DESC

rules.description: 查询特定供应商的相关信息和物料
rules.action_target: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE supplier LIKE CONCAT("%", ?, "%") ORDER BY inbound_time DESC
